name.mr: Screen Recorder Screen Capture Video Record

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e: Capture your screen and download screen videos instantly in seconds.
short.en,en_AU,es_419,uk: Easily record screen, tab or window and save video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension is a cool find. Screen Video Recorder is a simple and free screen recorder that allows you to record any area of the screen or take a screenshot of it. Easy to use, lightweight, and will make your life easier. When you need to share important information, or a moment from the game, or record an important meeting, then this extension will come to your aid. Record your screen with sound and webcam. Screen Video Recorder is very fast and reliable. We made it as useful as possible for you.
